title: In My Father'S House,
lyrics:
In my Father's house,
In my Father's house,
In my Father's house
There are many mansions there
In my Father's house on high,
Happy happy, happy we shall be,
Happy, happy, happy we shall be,
Happy, happy, happy we shall be,
In my Father's house on high.
Children of Jericho, Let your light so shrine,
